Header.subtitle: A good way of expressing oneself in an Agile way

Main.hint: You can invite others to this session by copy-pasting the URL

Column.createGroupTooltip: Create a group to group posts together

Group.emptyGroupContent: Move a post here to fill this group

Post.voteRemainingOne: You only have one {{type}} remaining, make it count!
Post.cancelVote: Cancel your votes on this post

Customize.title: Customise your Session
Customize.timerCategorySub: Set the timer for the session
Customize.allowTimerHelp: Display a timer at the bottom of the screen
Customize.timerDurationHelp: The timer will be set to {{duration}} minutes
Customize.lockOnTimerEndHelp: Lock the session (make it read-only) when the timer ends
Customize.votingCategorySub: Set the rules about likes and dislikes
Customize.postCategorySub: Set the rules about what a user can do when creating or viewing a post
Customize.customTemplateCategorySub: Set the number of columns and their characteristics
Customize.maxUpVotesHelp: Maximum number of 'likes' votes a user is allowed to cast
Customize.maxDownVotesHelp: Maximum number of 'dislikes' votes a user is allowed to cast
Customize.maxPostsHelp: Maximum number of posts a user can create per session
Customize.allowSelfVotingHelp: Whether to allow a user to vote on their own post
Customize.allowMultipleVotesHelp: Whether to allow a user to vote multiple times on the same post
Customize.allowCancelVoteHelp: Whether to allow a user to cancel their vote on a specific post
Customize.allowActionsHelp: Whether to allow the 'Action' (follow-up) field on each post
Customize.allowAuthorVisibleHelp: Display the author of the post, on the post itself.
Customize.newPostsFirstHelp: New posts are added at the top of the column
Customize.allowGiphyHelp: Allow users to set a Giphy image against a post
Customize.allowGroupingHelp: Allow the creation of groups to group posts together
Customize.blurCardsHelp: Cards content is blurred until the moderator reveals the content
Customize.templateHelp: Use a pre-defined set of columns

PostBoard.disconnected: You have been disconnected from the current session.
PostBoard.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. You can view this session as a spectator, but must login to participate.
PostBoard.lockedDescription: You can no longer add or edit posts, as the timer ran out. This can be changed in the session settings.
PostBoard.error_action_unauthorised: You are not allowed to perform this action.
PostBoard.error_cannot_get_session: Could not get the session data. Please reload the page.
PostBoard.error_cannot_register_vote: Your vote was not registered successfully.
PostBoard.error_cannot_save_group: The group you created could not be saved.
PostBoard.error_cannot_save_post: The post you created could not be saved.
PostBoard.error_cannot_delete_group: The group could not be deleted
PostBoard.error_cannot_delete_post: The post could not be deleted
PostBoard.maxPostsReached: You have reached the maximum number of posts set by the moderator.

deleteConfirmation.title: Delete this post?
deleteConfirmation.description: This will delete the post and all its votes. This action cannot be undone.

PostBoard.demo: Welcome to this demo ðŸŽ‰ Feel free to play around and change settings. You can also close this message at any time.

AnonymousLogin.namePlaceholder: Please enter a name or nickname here to continue
AnonymousLogin.anonymousAuthDescription: This will create an anonymous account. Some features won't be available.

SocialMediaLogin.info: This will use a third party provider of your choosing to authenticate you. No password is stored.

AccountLogin.info: Login with your email and password.

Register.errorGeneral: An error occurred while trying to create your account.
Register.messageSuccess: Thank you! You should receive an email shortly to validate your account.

ValidateAccount.success: Your email has been correctly validated. I'm going to log you in in a sec!
ValidateAccount.error: There was an error validating your email.
ValidateAccount.loading: We are validating your email. Please wait.

ResetPassword.doneMessage: Done! Have a look in your emails, you should get a link to reset your password.
ResetPassword.info: Forgot your password? Not a problem. Enter your email below and you'll get a reset email prompto.
ResetPassword.success: Your password has been updated. I'm going to log you in in a sec!
ResetPassword.error: There was an error updating your password.
ResetPassword.loading: We are updating your password. Please wait.

SummaryBoard.noPosts: There are no posts to display
SummaryBoard.copyAsRichText: Copy the summary as Rich Text
SummaryBoard.copySuccessful: You successfully copied your summary in your clipboard

dialog.title: Invite people to your retrospective
dialog.text: To invite people to your retrospected session, simply send them the following URL

Actions.tooltip: Create an action on the back of this item
Actions.label: Open the Action panel
Actions.title: Action

DeleteSession.firstLine: Deleting a session is irreversible. It will delete all posts, votes, groups, and the session itself. The data cannot be restored.
DeleteSession.secondLine: Are you sure you want to delete this session and all its content?
DeleteSession.cancel: No, I'm sorry, I made a mistake

RevealCards.dialogContent: This will reveal all blurred cards for everyone. This cannot be undone.

AccountPage.noEmptyNameError: You cannot choose an empty display name. Please try again.
AccountPage.anonymousError: Anonymous accounts cannot have access to their profile (because they don't have one).

slack.help: Add the Retrospected Bot to your slack workspace, and get the ability to start a retro with a simple command: '/retro My Retro'.

plan.youAreOwner: You are the owner of this plan, through the subscription below.
plan.youAreMember: You are on this plan through somebody else's subscription.
plan.notPro: You are not a Pro user, despite being an administrator for the plan. Add yourself to the list of Pro accounts in the section below.

membersEditor.title: Your Team
membersEditor.limitReached: You reached the limit of your subscription ({{limit}} users, including yourself). Please remove members, or upgrade to an unlimited Company account.
membersEditor.info: Add emails below to grant Pro accounts to up to {{limit}} other colleagues. Press Enter after each email address.

adminsEditor.added: {{email}} is now an administrator of this subscription.
adminsEditor.removed: {{email}} is no longer an administrator of this subscription.
adminsEditor.title: Administrators
adminsEditor.description: Administrators can add users to or remove users from the subscription. Administrators are not automatically granted Pro accounts.

deleteAccount.title: GDPR
deleteAccount.warning: You have the right to be forgotten. That being said, be careful when deleting your account. This cannot be undone.

confirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
confirm.description: There is no going back on this.
confirm.confirmation: Yes I want to delete all my data

modal.deleteAccount: Delete your account and any identities linked to your email.

deleteSessions.main: Should we delete the sessions (retrospectives) you have created?
deleteSessions.selected: Your sessions and all their data, including other people's posts and votes, will be permanently deleted.
deleteSessions.unselected: Your sessions will be kept and their author will become an anonymous user.

deletePosts.main: Should we delete all the posts you wrote?
deletePosts.selected: Your posts, in any session, and their associated votes and actions will be permanently deleted.
deletePosts.unselected: Your posts will be kept, but they will become associated with an anonymous user.

deleteVotes.main: Should we also delete all your votes?
deleteVotes.selected: Your votes, in all sessions will be permanently deleted.
deleteVotes.unselected: Your votes will be kept, but they will become associated with an anonymous user.

SubscribePage.alertAlreadyPro: You already are a Pro user, so you might not need another subscription.
SubscribePage.alertAlreadySubscribed: You already have a subscription, so you might not need another subscription.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Pick a currency you would like to be billed with
currency.warning: Your account is already set to use {{currency}}, so you cannot change the currency anymore.

plan.title: Plan
plan.description: Choose the plan that fits your use case!

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Your unlimited subscription applies to a given domain. Any user with this email domain will automatically become a Pro user.
domain.invalidDomain: Please provide a valid domain. The domain cannot be a free or disposable email domain.

subscribe.title: Checkout
subscribe.description: You will be redirected to our partner, Stripe, for payment
subscribe.cannotRegisterWithAnon: You need to be logged in with an OAuth or Password account to continue.

SubscribeModal.title: Pro Subscription
SubscribeModal.description: Protect your company's data by subscribing to Retrospected Pro. With Retrospected Pro, get the following features and more:

encryptedSession.title: Encrypted Sessions
encryptedSession.description: Your data is encrypted in your browser, making any decryption impossible on the Retrospected server.

privateSessions.title: Private Sessions
privateSessions.description: Make sure only authorised people can access your session.

unlimitedPosts.title: Unlimited Posts
unlimitedPosts.description: With a Pro subscription, get unlimited posts.

Products.team: Perfect for smaller teams, you can select up to 20 colleagues who will be upgraded to a Pro account.
Products.unlimited: If you are a bigger company, you will enjoy an unlimited number of Pro accounts.
Products.self-hosted: Retrospected on premises, one-time fee and unlimited updates. Keep total control of your data, for ever.
Products.wantToPayYearly: I want to pay annually (every 12 months), and get one month free per year!

Encryption.sessionEncryptedHaveKeyTooltip: This session is encrypted, and the key is stored in your browser. You can open this session without having to provide the password again.
Encryption.sessionEncryptedNoKeyTooltip: This session is encrypted, and the key is not stored in your browser. You will be asked for the decryption key when opening this session.
Encryption.sessionEncryptedWrongKeyTooltip: This session is encrypted, and the key you have stored is not the correct key.
Encryption.newEncryptedSessionWarningContent: It is very important for you to save the full URL (which contains the key) somewhere safe, or at least the encryption key: {{key}}. If you lose this encryption key, there is nothing that can be done to retrieve the data.
Encryption.sessionEncryptionError: This session is encrypted, and you don't seem to have the decryption key stored locally. Please use the original link, including the decryption key.

Private.lockSuccessNotification: Your session has been successfuly made private. No new participants can join.
Private.unlockSuccessNotification: Your session has been successfuly made public. Anyone can join.
Private.lockDescription: You are about to make the session private. Only the current participants (listed below) will be allowed access to this session once locked.
Private.sessionLockedDescription: Please ask its moderator to unlock it so you can join. Then, refresh this page.
Private.sessionNonProTitle: This session is only accessible to Pro users
Private.sessionNonProDescription: This session uses features only available to Pro users. Please ask the moderator or subscription holder to give you a Pro account.
Private.sessionIsPublic: This session is public and accessible to anyone.
Private.sessionIsPrivate: This session is private, and you have access.
Private.sessionIsPrivateNoAccess: This session is private, but you do not have access.

TrialPrompt.allowanceReachedTitle: You have reached your free allowance
TrialPrompt.allowanceReachedDescription: In order to get unlimited posts, please  subscribe to Retrospected Pro
TrialPrompt.nearEndAllowanceTitle: You are nearing the end of your quota
TrialPrompt.remainingTrialSentence: You have {{remaining}} left on your trial.
TrialPrompt.trialEndedTitle: Your Retrospected Pro Trial has ended
TrialPrompt.trialEndedSentence: Subscribe today to regain access to the Pro features.

Timer.stopTimerTitle: Are you sure you want to stop (and reset) the timer?
Timer.stopTimerDescription: If you stop the timer, it will be reset to its original duration.
